overview: Sari (26) comes into the life of Adi (28), a man who has been completely blind since birth, as a neighbor in the rented house he recently lived in. Sari always visits in the afternoon, to check on Adi's condition, who recently lived alone. Melted by Sari's attention, Adi wants to be able to see, wants to be with his girlfriend longer.
title: Semara
